snippet.title: "ZED ZONE - APOCALYPSE AHEAD" - Early Access Date Announced Trailer. Upcoming Zombie Survival Game
snippet.description:
"Zed Zone" Early Access release date : March 31, 2023

"ZED ZONE - APOCALYPSE AHEAD" is an upcoming openworld zombie apocalypse survival game.
The game will provides you with a seamless hardcore survival experience.
 zombies, post-apocalypse, survival, procedurally-generated world and unexpected deaths..


From the release of the first "ZED ZONE" test video in August 2019, to the initial version package, to Kickstarter, to two rounds of closed beta testing, and now the upcoming "Early Access" launch... 4 years have quietly passed.

During the small-scale closed beta testing, I received a lot of feedback, which provided me with many ideas and made development smoother than before. Therefore, I believe that for me, testing is not just a formality; it is a real part of development. 
While a team can brainstorm together, for an individual developer, player feedback and communication are the only way to get different perspectives. So, I do need the "Early Access".

After Early Access release, we will continue to seek and consider everyone's ideas and suggestions. We also welcome players who enjoy post-apocalyptic survival genre to join our "Early Access" and be a part of the process.  Thank you :D



Wishlist on Steam :
https://store.steampowered.com/app/12...
Join us on discord:
https://discord.gg/ubSwvGgMuJ
Follow the dev on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/INDIEDEV_LIU
Developer Emai: 
cheshendog@gmail.com

Thanks for watching :D
